Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by bcbites I am 31, and I have breast cancer. I am ER+, HER2+ and BRCA+. Can I get pregnant on tamoxifen, and carry the child healthily to term? Do I need to have chemo because I'm HER2+, and BRCA1+ (that is what's been recommended to me).Do I have less of a chance of recurrence if I have an oopherectomy/hysterectomy, or if I just take tamoxifen for the 5 recommended years? Please answer soon!
Posts.Title: breast cancer ER+, HER2+, BRCA1+

Posts.Content: I am 31, and I have breast cancer. I am ER+, HER2+ and BRCA+. Can I get pregnant on tamoxifen, and carry the child healthily to term? Do I need to have chemo because I'm HER2+, and BRCA1+ (that is what's been recommended to me).Do I have less of a chance of recurrence if I have an oopherectomy/hysterectomy, or if I just take tamoxifen for the 5 recommended years?
Posts.Title: breast cancer ER+, HER2+, BRCA1+
